reference.title: WriteToLogFile : To send string to log file

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will output text passed as parameter "msg" to all log files. The return value of this function will be 0 or 1.

section.title: Returns
section.p: A value zero indicate failure condition while a value 1 indicate a success condition. This function can return 0 in case logging is OFF or user has passed a NULL pointer.
